author: Matt Stieb
title: McKinsey to Work on Trump’s Coronavirus Plan and New York’s ‘Trump-Proof’ Plan
description: The NY and NJ governors hired McKinsey to “Trump-proof” their coronavirus plan, which may prove difficult as the firm is also working for Trump.
content:
